1819-07-12 Opera House

Title
1819-07-12 Opera House
Item Identifier
lsidyv4332b851_1809-1821_Lyceum_English_Opera_0335
Archive Holding Document
British Library
Announcements

Venue: Lyceum English Opera House
Location: London
Date: 1819-07-12

The Jovial Crew

Genre: Comick Ballad Opera
Genre tag: Comic Opera
Composer, original Airs: Mr. Bates
Composer, original Airs: Dr. Arne

Amateurs and Actors

Genre: Musical Comedy
Genre tag: Comedy
Music selected and arranged: Mr. Hart
Scenery: Mr. Gill

Raymond and Agnes; Or, The Bleeding Nun

Genre: Serious Ballet
Genre tag: Ballet Melodrama
Scenery: Mr. Gill
Composer, music: Mr. Reeve
Producer, ballet: Mr. T. P. Cooke

Cast List for The Jovial Crew

Mr. Lancaster as Oldrents
Mr. Kent as Hearty
Mr. Wrench as Springlove
Mr. W. S. Chatterley as Randal
Mr. Wilkinson as Oliver
Mr. Pearman as Vincent
Mr. Broadhurst as Hilliard
Mr. Dowton as Justice Clack
Mr. Rowbotham as Patrico
Mr. Salter as Martin
Mr. Richardson as Scentwell
Mr. Andrews as Beggar
Mr. Bowman as Beggar
Mr. Brown as Beggar
Mr. Edwards as Beggar
Mr. Fisher as Beggar
Mr. Gouriet as Beggar
Mr. Hart as Beggar
Mr. Huckel as Beggar
Mr. Jenkins as Beggar
Mr. Jones as Beggar
Mr. Lodge as Beggar
Mr. Massey as Beggar
Mr. Nickols as Beggar
Mr. Parker as Beggar
Mr. Spratley as Beggar
Mr. Webster as Beggar
Mr. Campbell as Servant
Mr. Ellis as Servant
Miss Kelly as Rachel
Miss I. Stevenson as Meriel
Miss Love as Amie (2nd Time)
Mrs. Huckel as Beggar Woman
Mrs. Jerrold as Beggar Woman
Mrs. Lancaster as Beggar Woman
Mrs. Mansel as Beggar Woman
Mrs. Mears as Beggar Woman
Mrs. Shaw as Beggar Woman
Mrs. Webster as Beggar Woman
Miss Dennett as Beggar Woman
Miss Ellis as Beggar Woman
Miss Hobbs as Beggar Woman
Miss Jerrold as Beggar Woman
Miss Lancaster as Beggar Woman
Miss Newton as Beggar Woman
Miss Tokely as Beggar Woman

Cast List for Amateurs and Actors

Mr. Pearman as David Dulcet, Esq. (A Musical Dramatick Amateur, who employs Mr. O. P. Bustle; he is attached to Theatricals & Miss Mary Hardacre)
Mr. Harley as Mr. O. P. Bustle (A provincial Manager, but engaged to superintend some private Theatricals, IMITATING EVERYBODY, AND HIMSELF AMONG THE NUMBER)
Mr. Wrench as Wing (A poor Country Actor)
Mr. Richardson as Berry (An actor for the heavy business)
Mr. Dowton as Elderberry (A retired Manufacturer, simple in Wit and Manners, & utterly unacquained with Theatricals)
Mr. Huckel as Timkins (Elderberry’s Factotum)
Mr. Wilkinson as Geoffry Muffincap (An elderly Charity Boy, let out as a Servant at Bustle’s Lodgings)
Miss Love as Miss Mary Hardacre (A fugitive Ward of Elderberry’s)
Miss I. Stevenson as Mrs. Mary Goneril (A strolling Tragedy Actress and a serious Evil to her Husband)

Cast List for Raymond and Agnes; Or, The Bleeding Nun

Mr. Webster as Don Raymond
Mr. Richardson as Don Felix, Father to Raymond
Mr. Rowbotham as Count of Lindenbergh
Mr. Brown as Theodore, Page to Raymond
Mr. Ellis as Marco, Master of the Hotel
Mr. T. P. Cooke as Robert, robber
Mr. Couriet as Jacques, robber
Mr. Salter as Baptiste, their father
Mr. Fisher as Claude, a Postillion and one of the Banditti
Mr. Andrews as (Monk Domestic, &c.)
Mr. Bowman as Monk Domestic, &c.
Mr. Campbell as Monk Domestic, &c.
Mr. Edwards as Monk Domestic, &c.
Mr. Jenkins as Monk Domestic, &c.
Mr. Lodge as Monk Domestic, &c.
Mr. Massey as Monk Domestic, &c.
Mr. Nickols as Monk Domestic, &c.
Mr. Parker as Monk Domestic, &c.
Mr. Spratley as Monk Domestic, &c.
Mrs. W. S. Chatterley as Margueritte, Baptiste's Mistress
Miss Shaw as The Child
Mrs. Shaw as Spectre of the Bleeding Nun, Mother of Agnes
Mrs. Richardson as Countess of Lindenbergh, Step-mother to Agnes
Mrs. Jerrold as Abbess of St. Claire
Miss Jerrold as Annette
Miss Love as Agnes, Dauther to the Count of Lindenbergh
Mrs. Dennett as Nun of the Convent of St. Claire
Mrs. Ellis as Nun of the Convent of St. Claire
Mrs. Hobbs as Nun of the Convent of St. Claire
Mrs. Huckel as Nun of the Convent of St. Claire
Mrs. Lancasters as Nun of the Convent of St. Claire
Mrs. Mansel as Nun of the Convent of St. Claire
Mrs. Mears as Nun of the Convent of St. Claire
Mrs. Newton as Nun of the Convent of St. Claire
Mrs. Tokely as Nun of the Convent of St. Claire
Mrs. Webster as Nun of the Convent of St. Claire
